name: Mechanics Drop Set
intensity_range: Same load, easier angles each shift
amrap: yes (each mechanical variant to near failure)
overview_and_execution: Use the same weight but shift your body or limb position to a stronger mechanical advantage after failing the weaker variation. Typically 2-3 shifts in one set.
example_application: Shoulder trifecta: Start with standing lateral raise to failure, then partial side raises (top half) to failure, then upright row with same DB to failure.
important_notes: Great for advanced hypertrophy. Minimizes setup changes. Keep each shift safe and maintain form.
volume_metrics: One extended set with 2-3 mechanical variations
